channel.title: SkiNewMexico.com Snow Report
channel.description: Snow Reports for New Mexico's Ski Areas. Including: Angel Fire, Enchanted Forest, Pajarito Mountain, Red River, Sandia Peak, Ski Apache, Ski Santa Fe, and Taos Ski Valley

item.title: Angel Fire Resort / 0" new / 23" base / 31 trails open / 6 of 7 lifts open / Snowmaking: YES / Surface Cond: PP/MGS

description.p: Comments: Expert trails Minder Binder and Hells Bells now open. We're open top to bottom, front and back. Find great Stay & Ski packages at www.angelfireresort.com..
Daily Email Snow Reports, Web Cams, Discounts and more... www.skinewmexico.com

item.title: Enchanted Forest x-c / 0" new / 15" base / 100% trails open / N/A lifts open / Snowmaking: No / Surface Cond: PP

description.p: Comments: Headlamp Snowshoe Cookout Tour Jan 8th, 5pm. Reservations required.
Daily Email Snow Reports, Web Cams, Discounts and more... www.skinewmexico.com

item.title: Pajarito Mountain / 0" new / 29" base / 30 trails open / 5 lifts open / Snowmaking: / Surface Cond: PDR/MGS

description.b: Please Note - Ski Area does not operated daily
description.p: Comments: We are open. Our normal winter schedule is in effect.....Fridays, Saturdays, Sundays and Federal Holidays.

item.title: Red River / 0" new / 25-30" base / 31 of 57 trails open / 6 lifts open / Snowmaking: YES / Surface Cond: PP - MGS

description.p: Comments: Go to redriverskiarea.com/snow-grooming-report for the most current conditions

item.title: Sandia Peak / 0" new / 38" base / 28 trails open / 5 lifts open / Snowmaking: yes / Surface Cond: PP

description.p: Comments: Sandia Peak is open for the 2010-11. 100% percent of the trails and all lifts are open!

item.title: Sipapu / 0" new / 22 - 30" base / 33 of 41 trails open / 5 of 5 lifts open / Snowmaking: Yes / Surface Cond: PDR/PP/MGS

description.p: Comments: January 4th is 2 for 1 Tuesday: buy one full-day, full-price lift ticket, get a second of equal or lesser value FREE! 800-587-2240 www.SipapuNM.com
Daily Email Snow Reports, Web Cams, Discounts and more... www.skinewmexico.com

item.title: Ski Apache / 0" new / 24-26" base / 9 trails open / 5 lifts open / Snowmaking: Yes / Surface Cond: MGS/PDR

description.p: Comments: Lifts #3, #4, #5, and #7 are OPEN. The Gondola is OPEN for sightseeing rides (Lifts are open Weather Permitting). For Ticket Prices call 575 464-1234.
Daily Email Snow Reports, Web Cams, Discounts and more... www.skinewmexico.com

item.title: Ski Santa Fe / 0" new / 43" base / 62 trails open / 6 lifts open / Snowmaking: yes / Surface Cond: MGS/PDR

description.p: Comments: The mountain is open! 83% of the trails available. All lifts are operating. Reg. lift ticket prices in effect. Grab your gear, the snow is calling.

item.title: Taos Ski Valley / 0" new / 44" base / 51 trails open / 12 lifts open / Snowmaking: Yes / Surface Cond: PDR/PP

description.p: Comments: Tons of terrain opening daily!!!

item.title: Valles Caldera Nordic / 0.0" new / 12" base / 100% trails open / No Lifts lifts open / Snowmaking: No / Surface Cond: PP/MGS

description.b: Please Note - Ski Area does not operated daily
description.p: Comments: Open Friday-Sunday. All Trails Groomed. Beautiful Scenic Skiing! Jan. 8 is Winter Trails Day - free day passes. For additional information, www.vallescaldera.gov or 866-382-5537
Daily Email Snow Reports, Web Cams, Discounts and more... www.skinewmexico.com
